channel.title: Maple Glaze :: Recipe Book
channel.description: Ingredients Ingredient ½ Batch 1 Batch Powdered Sugar 60g 120g Maple Syrup 30g 60g Milk (as needed) 1–2 tsp 2–4 tsp Salt small pinch pinch Preparation In a bowl, whisk together powdered sugar and salt. Add maple syrup and 1 tsp milk, whisking until smooth. Add more milk as needed, a few drops at a time, until desired consistency is reached (should be pourable but not runny). Use immediately to glaze pastries, cakes, or donuts. Allow glaze to set before packaging.
